title: Gallery In Three.js HackED Beta 2017
description: Gallery in Three.js is a 3-D gallery app made in Three.js, which is a 3-D Javascript library. The web application has three modes, in which GIFS are displayed on the walls in a hallway that you can walk through. This hack won in the category: Best Web/Data Hack

title: Arduino Chess
description: Player vs. Player implementation of Chess, on the Arduino

title: ATB 101 Project
description: Winning team for the "Capstone Project". It is a case competition-like format, but it lasts 4 months and each team of 10 tackled differend problems.

title: Slack Meme Bot
description: Will spam memes as you in a slack channel of your choice. Intervals between posts follow a gamma distribution so as to not arouse suspicion from your peers...

title: Rezz Goggles
description: I wanted an excuse to play with my Arduinos, and LED glasses look cool. This one is a work in progress.
